FormEncode Community
++++++++++++++++++++

Discussion takes place on the mailing list,
formencode-discuss@lists.sf.net:

* `Subcribe
  <http://lists.sourceforge.net/mailman/listinfo/formencode-discuss>`__

* `Archives
  <http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?forum_name=formencode-discuss>`__

Updates to the repository are emailed to the (inaccurately named)
mailing list formencode-cvs@lists.sf.net:

* `Subscribe
  <http://lists.sourceforge.net/mailman/listinfo/formencode-cvs>`__

The repository can be checked out with::

    git clone git://github.com/formencode/formencode.git

Note: the SourceForge CVS repository and svn.colorstudy.com Subversion
repositories and bitbucket Mercurial repositories are out of date and no longer used.

Bugs can be reported in the `github bug tracker
<https://github.com/formencode/formencode/issues>`_.
